page.title: 12Home Life and Hobbies
page.content: For Sharon, a typical day begins at 07.30 when she has breakfast with her two brothers before going to school at 09.00. She returns home for lunch between 12.00 and 13.00 and attends afternoon school until 15.40.Tea is at 16.30 followed by some time watching television before bed at 21.00. Spare time may be spent enjoying hobbies. For Wayne this includes shooting, especially clay pigeon shooting at Weathersfield Air Base with Bocking Clay Pigeon Club, and sailing the family's GP14 dingy. Mark was born in Thailand and his neighbour Bill is Vietnamese so their lives have changed dramatically since their arrival in Britain. They spend time watching television in order to help improve their English. Mark is keen on sport and regularly competes as a member of school teams.
